website_summaries.verdict: On the aesthetics front, this shoe is a compelling Adidas product. However, wearers settling for simply its good looks would miss out on its exuberant comfort, outstanding waterproofing, and excellent durability. With all that said, its subpar midsole is just one of its cons which drove it away from perfection. To sum up, if taken for the things it so lavishly offers, the Adidas Terrex Swift R2 GTX can be considered as one of the reliable hiking shoes for tackling challenging trails.
pros: The Terrex Swift R2 GTX astonishes droves of Adidas loyalists with its astounding level of comfort
A decent percentage of reviewers deeply appreciate the overall look of the shoe
Many owners praise the Terrex Swift R2 GTX for its lasting durability
This Adidas hiking product gains the approval of expert reviewers thanks to its ability to stay watertight in wet conditions
A number of users, including a couple of gear critics, got a secure ride over unpredictable terrain with the help of its superbly grippy outsole
Its amazing lightness has earned the respect of several testers
A seasoned critic observes that the break-in time is fairly quick
The majority declares that its breathability made their hikes more comfortable
cons: Some owners do not feel very confident with the hiker’s quick-pull laces
Replacing such laces—when they break beyond use—would prove to be quite the challenge, according to them
A professional reviewer criticizes the shoe’s midsole which was not able to cushion his foot well against pointier terrain elements
Less than a handful dislike its too-tight-fit right out of the box
A small group of male testers gives the stability of the women's and men’s Adidas  Terrex Swift R2 GTX a low score, declaring that it lacked in lateral support while traversing uneven surfaces

customer_reviews.title: definitely waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Seen a few reviews that question whether these are waterproof. I live on a farm and have treated these like sh*t and I can assure you that I'm happy in this respect. I'm still really not sure if I like pull- chord laces to be honest but I have no complaints about the performance of these shoes. Upate 7 months later: Still tough and waterproof. However, I find I can't get on with these. The heel rises and falls even when the questionable quick laces are pulled tight. I also find them a little tight in the toe box. While I don't hate these, I think I'll have to try something else. Looking at Salomons.
customer_reviews.author: Mob Bunkhouse

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes - but laces snapped after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes - v tough - but the laces snapped! So now pretty much useless. I was just putting them on as usual and one of them broke - can't work out how to replace them. Since writing this I bought some new laces, could only find them in white.
customer_reviews.author: Wil Davies

customer_reviews.title: Robust and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Generally these are are good walking trainers. They fit well, the soles have amazing grip and the water proofing is a top notch. I even don't mind the speed laces, although given the negative reviews I've been very careful when tightening. I have the black pair and they are robust and look good. I've marked them down as they are very rigid with limited give. The inner sole has no cushion so after several long days of walking they feel a chore to wear. Hopefully they are just taking longer to break in. Update: took longer than expected but they've been broken in and are quite comfortable now. Rating increased to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mcintyre

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Spring hike
customer_reviews.text: I took these shoes to my hiking in Georgia and I must say I was extremely pleased with them. The sole grip is good on any terrain (with only one slip over a wet muddy metal platform) and I tested successfully the waterproof material while standing in a river taking long exposure photos. The shoe feels slightly stiff when you wear the first time but it adapts to your foot very quickly and in the end feels fairly comfortable. I had no problems with the lacing system.
customer_reviews.author: fabienb

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought these 20.5.19 and would never buy again, four months later and they’re trashed compared to my Salomon which last me 8/12 months. These Adidas although says goretex lines have never been waterproof and the insoles are terrible. Wouldn’t recommend these to anyone. They might look good but they can’t take the work. Very disappointing. Never buy again
customer_reviews.author: Mr Hug

customer_reviews.title: The sole wears incredibly quickly. Possibly made from Play-dough!
customer_reviews.text: A great looking shoe, badly let down by the incredibly soft Continental sole. I appreciate that Formula One racing cars must change their tyres during each race, but I am not a race car, and did not expect a shoe, retailing around £100, to wear away to nothing in a few months of light intermittent use. Blatant profiteering from Adidas. Very disappointed with the longevity, if not the performance. The upper still appears as new. The soles are gone! Avoid!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Mostly, very happy and I would buy again but a full size bigger.
customer_reviews.text: They are very nice shoes and feel like they will be hard wearing for day to day casual use. My only reservation is the size, I usually choose a size 8 but from previous reviews-stating the trainer is on the small side. I chose to buy a half size bigger but they are still on the neat side for my liking. Overall, I am happy as I will use them for casual wear while out and about. Next time, I shall buy a full size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Malkyak

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: I put them on my feet as soon as I got them and they are great! I was already impressed by the way they looked in the pictures but on my feet they are fabulous. The design is fresh and well thought, they are comfortable and I know already they will stay comfortable. The shoes feel light on wearing and the feet can breathe.The sole grip is great aswell. I purchased these shoes for work as I'm outdoors most of the time. I'm looking forward to get the mid gtx boots for winter just for casual wearing as I really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Gheorghe Attila Vintila

customer_reviews.title: Best footwear I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: Worn these every day for 8 months , and walked min 12 miles and up to 20 miles per day during this period. Fully waterproof, very comfortable. I bought +1 size, and they are just right. Absolutely, unquestionably the best foot wear I personally have owned. The price varies, look out for them when they're on offer , buy multiple pairs.
customer_reviews.author: neil orange peel

customer_reviews.title: These are not wide fit now.
customer_reviews.text: I already have a pair of these shoes in different coloures so I thought I can just order a same size and happy days. Unfortunately the new is 5-8mm narrower than the old. Also these are less padded than the my old non gtx version.
customer_reviews.author: JamónSerrano

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for general use rather than hiking specifically and I use them on at days or bringing kids to soccer etc. They look well and are very comfortable, providing great support to the foot. My feet are on the wider side and the fit is snug. So maybe consider getting these a half size larger. The material is stiff and durable. I have previously had similar by Salomen and these are as good if not better.
customer_reviews.author: M TWOMEY

customer_reviews.title: Lovely dry feet!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I wanted waterproof trainers and this is the second pair of these I have bought. Hate having wet feet. I wear them for work and waterproofing does wear off after a year but still plenty of wear left on sole
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing grip
customer_reviews.text: The grip on these shoes is amazing - I’ve never felt so confident walking on snowy/slippery ground as I have in these. A couple of minor gripes stop me from giving 5 stars - the speed laces are great but I sometimes feel they’re not tight enough, even when I’ve tightened as much as I can; and the insoles are a bit rigid, so can feel a little uncomfortable after a lot of walking (but that may just be a new shoe thing). But these are minor gripes - they’re brilliant waterproof shoes and I’m really pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: puregenius

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes but terrible support from Adidas!
customer_reviews.text: Size is different from other Adidas models, which is not very unexpected since it depends on the type of shoes. My 3 stars are justified by the fact that if your speed lace get screwed, Adidas doesn't sell spare parts of it! It's ridiculous, unbelievable, that a brand like Adidas doesn't have spare parts for this "system".
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Castro

customer_reviews.title: Hard wearing waterproof shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fantastically sturdy waterproof shoe, let down only by the shoddy laces. After c. 9 months of wear nearly every day taking the dog out in the British winter, I can confirm they are waterproof and the main shoe (soles, outer body etc) is still almost as good as when I first got it. The lace on one of my shoes has snapped off but I have just replaced with a normal lace.
customer_reviews.author: D Rap

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous walking shoes - great style and great quality. Returned first pair as they were a little bit tight, but a half-size up did the trick nicely. If you wear thick socks, then I'd suggest a full size bigger. No issues changing them - bigger pair received within two days. Been on a walking holiday for a week and found them brilliant - very comfortable and waterproof. Thoroughly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G. A. Hough

customer_reviews.title: Lace system flawed, Solomon copies.
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly BUT the lace system copies the Solomon lace system and doesn't do a good job of it often becoming loose! and not supporting my ankles. Quite cold and next to no padding around the toe area, should have got one of the Solomon GTX range. hope the seller understands this is the most crucial component on the hole trainer.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget_Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable tough trainer.
customer_reviews.text: Tough comfortable trainers. I have read the lace are break and some people don’t like the way they work, me personally think they are great. I had them 5 months now and still love them. The laces keep the tightness when you 1st do them up for the day. I just went to order a green pair but not available at present.
customer_reviews.author: Stu H

customer_reviews.title: Walking Shoes
customer_reviews.text: As with all walking shoes/boots you need to go a size larger, possibly even more with these, as they are quite snug across the foot, no matter how you try to loosen the laces. With these I can get into them with normal socks, but walking (thicker) would probably have to go up another size again. On the positive, waterproof, walking isn't a problem and apart from width, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shoe just need worn in a bit.
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic walking shoe. The right shoe felt a bit tighter than left for the first week or so but one they've worn in they feel great. Just make sure to get half a size larger than you normally would. You could even go one full size bigger and they would still be perfect. Excellent grip very comfortable, now they've been worn in. I definitely recommend Adidas Terrex.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Quality well made product, they are a bit small sized i took the advice from reviews & went a half size bigger than normal & they fit fine, they are also quite narrow,. The soles are a bit rigid they remind me of the cleat shoe's cyclist wear that lock into the pedals.
customer_reviews.author: Longshanx

customer_reviews.title: The best cross trainers ever, forget the rest Adidas is the best
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant trainers. Great sole, waterproof, fit perfectly, great new speed lace system and the black is awesome. They look much better than they do in the pictures. The black is very deep black and too date (I'm 48) these are the best cross trainers or just the best trainers that I have ever bought. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: AresFM

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and look good
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect for me. I work with water so needed waterproof shoes They are Very comfortable and quick and easy to put on. They had mixed reviews and i was nearly put off them but in the end I thought what the hell I’ll give them a go. I’m glad I did. I went for half size bigger as i read in the reviews they are a little tight. They fit me perfectly. Definitely would recommend these shoes
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Excellent trainers
customer_reviews.text: The trainers I got for my husband butter there excepted attchaly, he is really impressed with them, the bottoms of them are like the bottom of walking boots, so very good for people who dus a lost of walking/hiking and you don't want to were boots then these trainers for you, thay are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter gentle

customer_reviews.title: Buy the half size up - 2nd pair still great
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe/trainer just what I was looking for waterproof but looks good. I would definitely buy half a size up... I'm normally a size10 but I've just had to buy the size10.5 . I'll be keeping the 10 in the car though but if you were wearing all day you will need that little bit extra
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these shoes
customer_reviews.text: These wouldn't be the most comfortable fit to go shopping, but when getting lost in the forest, walking in mud and bad conditions they are the best. Much better protection from the elements than I expected. Very good!
customer_reviews.author: Shay Leon

customer_reviews.title: Good solid build at a very fair price
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable stick very well to slippery surfaces. People complaining about the lacing system well I haven't had an issue what so ever unless you pull them to hard but I don't use the lacing system I opened them up and now they slip on and off sweetly
customer_reviews.author: Duane Relton

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic walking shoes, however, I use these for my gardening business and buy these every year. They are robust, water resistant, comfortable, however, if you are a size 10 you'll need an 11!!!! Brilliant shoe, used over 5 years now every year.
customer_reviews.author: michael stevens

customer_reviews.title: another pair of excellent shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought second pair of those. They are indestructible , after wearing them for 3 years every day ! they are still in much better condition than my other Reebok's after one season!!!. Excellent shoes highly recommended !!!
customer_reviews.author: Maciej

customer_reviews.title: Regret my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've owned my Swifts for 7 months and I've worn through the soles! These have been by far the quickest pair of Approach/Light hiking shoes I've ever owned. In addition, mine aren't waterproof. I will say that other than the sole everything has held up very well including the lace system, but then they are only 7 months old! I have bought more expensive approach shoes and they've lasted 18 months. I would not recommend these if you do any decent amount of walking!
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: walking/hiking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes and look beautiful in all black colour. Just used it for sometime as of now, haven’t had chance to test them extensively but they feel good so am sure they would be fine for long period of usage. I am going on holidays next week and it’s going to be lots of walking and some hiking there so they will be thoroughly tested there. To give an idea about sizing, I am usually shoe size 9 and I went for half a size up for this shoe as 9.5 felt more comfortable than 9.
customer_reviews.author: GJ

customer_reviews.title: Incredible shoe
customer_reviews.text: Ordered my usual size a 7 but they where abit tight round my toes sent them back and got a 7.5 and they are perfect! I go hiking alot and these are amazing lightweight, waterproof and extremely grippy they are just perfect for me, I do love the whole no laces thing I have no issues with it, brilliant shoe, fast delivery will be buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: Must read this.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are better than Solomon. Same type. No doubt above it. I slipped on steps last year wearing Solomon and cut my little finger tendons now finger bent and needing further surgery! To repair. So for any doubters out there believe me invest in the better traction these offer! The fast lace system is better in my view as well! Shocking how comfortable out the box no brainer! Cheaper as well!
customer_reviews.author: Robert knight

customer_reviews.title: Great Initial Impression but........
customer_reviews.text: These look great and if they wear well and remain waterproof I'll be delighted. The negative is that I had to send the first pair back because they were too small. I'm a standard EU45 but with these I need a 46.
customer_reviews.author: The Doc

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in advance of going on a 22 mile charity walk which entailed all sorts of different terrains. What I didn't expect was we had to do it in the worst weather imaginable. I was one of around 20 people within my area at work who did it together, and I was the only one not complaining about my feet or blisters at the end of it. My feet were also perfectly dry! Brilliant is all I can say about these shoes, I would recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: James Shires

customer_reviews.title: Best Price on the net
customer_reviews.text: Really love these shoes, fit well, waterproof and best of all the cheapest price on the net.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are probably one of the best walking shoes I’ve ever bought. The soles made by continental tires is an amazing idea. I normally buy Solomon that don’t last long. I highly recommend these shoes to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Reading

customer_reviews.title: Good Grip
customer_reviews.text: Grip on these shoes are really good on wet and slippery surfaces. Haven't had a chance to test it on ice yet. Keeps your feet warm. It takes a few hours to get used to after switching from comfy sneakers tho.
customer_reviews.author: Alper

customer_reviews.title: Better than most in it's class.
customer_reviews.text: superb shoe , robust enough for Apre ski so can stand up to anything, including dancing on the tables. Cleans well, first pair I have owned with the drawstring style laces, but seem to hold well under tension. Goretex liner so say no more, lightweight and sturdy. Better than Salomons and look to be lasting in the stitching and sole.
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bitterly disappointed with these shoes. Has some Adidas terrex boots that lasted me years until the material split and the sole came off. Absolutely loved them. These are not a patch on the boots I had. They are not waterproof at all. Walked around the field one morning, which had a light dew and my feet were soaked. Have now purchased a pair of Salomon goretex shoes, which I can’t fault. Can not recommend these shoes at all.
customer_reviews.author: Adele R

customer_reviews.title: Just ridden into work with rain just about as bad as it gets in the UK and my feet are fine and dry.
customer_reviews.text: Just ridden into work with rain just about as bad as it gets in the UK and my feet are fine and dry. I've had these for about a month now and my forst time to try them- had 2 pairs of waterproof Salomons before and within a month they are letting water in, these do seem to be better shoes all round and for a much better price
customer_reviews.author: Intense

customer_reviews.title: Not fully waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed by getting wet feet a few times and having had numerous Goretex items before with no such issues I’m struggling to understand why. Comfy enough and fit as expected without needing to go to bigger size. Speedy laces are a good feature
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good product, resistent to the water and really comfy
customer_reviews.text: All good except the insoles, after changing them those shoes are perfect
customer_reviews.author: GiPi

customer_reviews.title: Too small for normal fet
customer_reviews.text: Trainers are too small for the average foot and also they pinch your toes when walking/.running, they are too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Dragons' Lair

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy for day to day wear
customer_reviews.text: I don't really do any hiking, was just after a pair of black trainers and bought these as they were on offer. They are really comfy for daily wear. The size as usual with Adidas I went half size up and perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: A shoe in great fit looks great
customer_reviews.text: Great looking trainer the wife loves these was delivered in time very quick deliver very happy would highly recommended thanks 5 🌟
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes,fiddler lace system.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes and beautiful to walk in . 4 stars only because of lacing system,I personally couldn’t get on with it and have removed it and replaced with ordinary laces- much better,also as other reviews these do run slightly small in size ,so I ordered 1/2 size larger.
customer_reviews.author: kheops5

customer_reviews.title: Really love trainers with Gortex.
customer_reviews.text: Not so keen on the type of lacing they use. Prefer conventional. Really robust shoes though and very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: C. Parcell

customer_reviews.title: Walking on air
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair of these shoes, bought for my husband who is very fussy about footwear, he loves them, hence the 3 pairs so far, very comfortable, good support, nice style and colour.
customer_reviews.author: M. F. Gamble

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and light weight, but has a nice robust sole. I have the goretex boots for 4years now and are of the same quality. Go at least a half size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G. Makin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for working or just chilling.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect buy. I'm 21st and stand on my feet all day. These are an excellent buy for the heavier guy.
customer_reviews.author: adrian bessant

customer_reviews.title: Look good, build quality poor.
customer_reviews.text: The speed lace failed (snapped) after wearing for only 2 weeks. I bought them ages ago but haven’t worn them so may not be able to return. I won’t buy again. Unfortunate because they look good.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Adidas shoes.
customer_reviews.text: This would be my third pair of the black one, I also have a brown pair and a blue pair.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great very comforatable Adidas Walking Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great very comforatable Adidas Walking Shoes, Very Stylish and great to walk in I'm glad I bought them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made trekking shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were a bit tight at first, but I persevered and I’m now very happy with them. Very easy to put on and tighten. Also very water resistant. I would definitely buy again, but maybe the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: MR LEE ORBELL

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased with these so far and will be ordering a ...
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with these so far and will be ordering a second pair at some point. Ordered a size 11 and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and practical and long lasting. These are my second pair.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes that I had to buy a second pair just in case they stop making them. nuff said :)
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Trainers
customer_reviews.text: Great for every day use also look brilliant when wearing them !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very tight fit.
customer_reviews.text: Only for narrow feet, very tight to get on, then very tight and hard feeling on, had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Stop pushing reviews so soon
customer_reviews.text: There ok , probably better if amazon would let me WEAR them in for a bit instead of messaging a week later
customer_reviews.author: G W.

customer_reviews.title: Maybe GTX but NOT waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Used for the first time in wet conditions ( a field with wet grass) and a massive let down . One shoe completely waterproof but the other leaks like a sieve . Suggests to me a flaw in the Gore tex
customer_reviews.author: James G.

customer_reviews.title: Neat!!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable glad I ordered half size up though and great sole grip.
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: Good boots
customer_reviews.text: Great waterproof walking boots, but good enough to wear under jeans. Bought two pairs for husband and son. The son thought they were too big but once he'd sussed out the laces , instructions were included, they were spot on. Third pair of these boots in the house, that says it all really.
customer_reviews.author: BrenKS

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: One of best trekking shoes of 2019 - likely. Fits and works really well. Good traction on either dry and wet stones. Really good
customer_reviews.author: Rshe

customer_reviews.title: These Terrex are Terribly Terrific
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Slightly bigger/wider than expected but add some nice thick hiking socks and they just right. Well made. Very practical. Can see them lasting a long time
customer_reviews.author: JL-sta

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable shoe don't like the speed laces although I'll get used to them.
customer_reviews.author: Executioner

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted. Waterproof, good looking and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the second pair of Terrex shoes I have bought and they are so comfortable to wear that I will be buying this range again when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Whelan

customer_reviews.title: terrex are terrific
customer_reviews.text: needed a good plain black shoe for work as im on my feet walking all day & i have a foot injury ongoing these were perfect fit comfort & look well pleased
customer_reviews.author: mr raemond m lenderyou

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing second pair brought last a whole year worn to work daily great value for money
customer_reviews.author: Kalavati Prudence

customer_reviews.title: Great Trainer
customer_reviews.text: Like this product so much, took a bit of time to break in but now so comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Dave S

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, unfortunately they came up too small so I had to send them back
customer_reviews.author: satisfied reader

customer_reviews.title: Like offroad slippers !
customer_reviews.text: Now on my 3rd pair. Tend to last me between 15-18 months wearing them most days. Very comfortable and waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: joanne reeson

customer_reviews.title: Very good fit
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! Great fir to the foot. Holds you foot in place and comfortable for walks. Looking forward to using these on my hikes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I like these and wear them out walking dog and mainly outdoors
customer_reviews.author: David Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Smart trainers
customer_reviews.text: These were a present for my grandson, he was extremely pleased with them. Just become a Teenager so hard to please.
customer_reviews.author: S E Deruelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect trekking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! I’ve been doing long walks in fields (16-20 miles) and these shoes are perfect for any kind of ground! Amazing grip on steep and muddy hills!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriele

customer_reviews.title: Smart and practical
customer_reviews.text: I love these trainers. They are smart, practical and a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LSS

customer_reviews.title: Good Waterproof trainers
customer_reviews.text: Great waterproof trainers use them for walking the dog so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super grip
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit (normally a 9 went for 9 1/2) superb grip and really light, hardly know your wearing them
customer_reviews.author: steven ingham

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Go at least half a size up for best fit
customer_reviews.author: r l foster

customer_reviews.title: Addidas gortex shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very good gortex shoes good fit very comfortable would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amjad

customer_reviews.title: Nice choice!
customer_reviews.text: At the beggining it was hurting a little bit. But now it is just complete embracing my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Rossetti

customer_reviews.title: Good grip & easy foot access
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the black ones for £55, which were a really good fit for me. I'm quite pleased with the quality and materials used. Tried them out on a field trip a few days ago, they have really good grip no matter what the surface. Hopefully they should last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Zahir

customer_reviews.title: Go for a size up
customer_reviews.text: Great trainer but I should have got the next size up. As it does seem a small fit
customer_reviews.author: D.B

customer_reviews.title: Too small did not fit
customer_reviews.text: The sellers page didn't say you need to order bigger than usual size. I am UK 8 have been for 35yrs -- UK 8 always fit. But these were too small. So will have to return
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thank you so much
customer_reviews.text: These are the best thank you they have been glued to my feet since I got them
customer_reviews.author: simon hill

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit
customer_reviews.text: Slip too much at the heel. I'm a very standard size 10 in everything, and a size 10 here slipped too much but any smaller and the toes wouldnt fit.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and secure when walking in different conditions
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made, comfortable and secure when walking in different conditions.
customer_reviews.author: scrope

customer_reviews.title: Narrow but great Waterproof shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great Waterproof shoes, use for cycling. I knew these were narrow before I bought them. I have hobbit feet so took a few months to break in
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Need improvements
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boots, but... GTX fabric is damaging by tiding stripe. After 2 months of wearing not any more waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Mateno

customer_reviews.title: DURABLE TRAINER
customer_reviews.text: I USED THE TRAINERS FOR WORK OUTDOORS DAILY.. HOWEVER YESTERDAY I NOTICED THE LACE FASTENING SNAPPED ON ONE OF THE TRAINERS. I HAVE BEEN IN TOUCH WITH THE SUPPLIER AND WAITING TO HEAR IF THEY CAN BE EXCHANGED
customer_reviews.author: Paul Daleymount

customer_reviews.title: Besat lightweight boots I have bought
customer_reviews.text: The soles are very impressive on slippery surfaces and I like the single pull lace-up system.
customer_reviews.author: MVS

customer_reviews.title: Too small for wide feets
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this shoes 1 size bigger than usul but it was still incredibly tight fit. So i had to return and order it again 2.5 size bigger than normal. If you have wide feets keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Serant KIYAK

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant trainers. In fact they are so good I'm going to buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Walking trainers - Look great and are very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They were quite stiff for the first 10 minutes of wearing them, but was surprised at how quickly they broke in. Well made trainer with a great sole that is both gripy and rugged. Highly recommended. Would love to see the same trainers as a safety shoe for work.
customer_reviews.author: The One

customer_reviews.title: Buy a bigger size than you normally do
customer_reviews.text: Overall they’re good but they’re small so mine are tight and as a result I hardly use them as can’t wear them for long.
customer_reviews.author: Mr P

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sole is too rigid, also the states size doesn`t fit comfortable
customer_reviews.author: marius timsa

customer_reviews.title: I've had these before brilliant footwear good for all weather they last well there ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had these before brilliant footwear good for all weather they last well there good on all terrain fantastic trainers and the price was amazing as well real cheap
customer_reviews.author: mr d cleaver

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and smart
customer_reviews.text: Rugged enough for hiking along rough tracks and smart enough for strolling around town, with the added benefit of good grip on pavements covered with wet slippery autumn leaves. I await to see how long they'll last!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !! I love it
customer_reviews.text: This the best out door shoes ever I bought, it’s light and the new lacing system is amazing. I love the color, the shape and the Gore-Tex works perfectly!!! Amazing shoes !!
customer_reviews.author: Abdulaziz

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Terrex Swift R2 GTX Low Rise Hiking Boots
product_meta.description: Move swiftly across alpine terrain in these trail shoes. A low-cut, durable upper with speed lacing supports your feet on uneven ground, while a Continental™ Rubber outsole sticks to wet and dry surfaces. A breathable, waterproof membrane keeps your feet dry every step of the way.
feature_bullets: Speed lacing; Lace Bungee stows laces
Ripstop mesh upper; TPU overlays; Molded TPU toe cap
Main materials: Textile and synthetic upper / Textile lining / Rubber outsole
